oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Alberta Sandell McCrary oral history
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: McCrary, Alberta
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Martin, Travis, interviewer; Williams, James, interviewer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A clip of an oral history with Alberta McCrary, a student at Middle Tennessee State Teachers College during the 1940s. McCrary shares her memories of the Eleventh College Training Detachment on campus during the 1940s.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War II; Campus life
World War, 1939-1945; Women; Women college students; United States. Army Air Forces. College Training Detachment, 11th; Middle Tennessee State Teachers College; Middle Tennessee State College
